    • fillClouds

      protected void fillClouds()
      Fill the cloudTiles on the table If one or more than one cloudTiles have still students on them, an error is notified to the players and the game will be closed

    • playAssistant

      private void playAssistant(AssistantCard assistantCard) throws IllegalActionException, IllegalAssistantException
      Gets the assistantCard index in the deck
      Parameters:
      assistantCard - the assistantCard to play
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - if the player is trying to execute an action in the wrong game phase
      IllegalAssistantException - if the assistantCard is equal to another played assistantCard and the player has at least another assistantCard in the deck

    • playAssistant

      private void playAssistant(int assistantIndex) throws IllegalActionException, IllegalAssistantException
      Plays the assistantCard
      Parameters:
      assistantIndex - the assistantCard's index in the deck
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - if the player is trying to execute an action in the wrong game phase
      IllegalAssistantException - if the assistantCard is equal to another played assistantCard and the player has at least another assistantCard in the deck

    • canPlayAssistant

      private boolean canPlayAssistant(AssistantCard assistant)
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistantCard
      Returns:
      true if the player can play the assistantCard

    • moveStudentToDiningRoom

      public void moveStudentToDiningRoom(PawnColor pawn) throws IllegalActionException, DiningRoomFullException
      Moves the PawnColor to the diningRoom
      Parameters:
      pawn - the PawnColor to move
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - if the player is trying to execute an action in the wrong game phase
      DiningRoomFullException - if the diningRoom for that PawnColor is full

    • tryStealProfessor

      public void tryStealProfessor(PawnColor color, Player player)
      Checks if the current player has more PawnColor than the other player If so, the professor of that color is added to the schoolBoard of the current player
      Parameters:
      color - the PawnColor just moved
      player - the other player

    • moveStudentOnIsland

      public void moveStudentOnIsland(PawnColor pawn, UUID uuid) throws WrongUUIDException
      Moves the PawnColor to the islandCard with the same uuid as the one in the message
      Parameters:
      pawn - the PawnColor to move
      uuid - the islandCard's uuid
      Throws:
      WrongUUIDException - if on the table there aren't islandCards with that uuid

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(int steps) throws NotAllowedMotherNatureMovementException, IllegalActionException
      Move mother nature After that checks the influence on the islandCard where it landed
      Parameters:
      steps - motherNature's steps
      Throws:
      NotAllowedMotherNatureMovementException - if the number of motherNature steps isn't valid
      IllegalActionException - if the player is trying to execute an action in the wrong game phase

    • checkInfluence

      protected void checkInfluence()
      Checks the influence on the islandCard with motherNature If every player has zero influence, no tower is built If one player has more influence than the others, his tower is built If two players have the same influence, and it's the max influence, no tower is built

    • isInfluenceDraw

      private boolean isInfluenceDraw(Player player, int influence)
      Checks if two players have the same max influence
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      influence - the max influence
      Returns:
      true if two players have the same max influence

    • buildTowers

      private void buildTowers(Player player)
      Builds the tower of the payer with max influence
      Parameters:
      player - the player with max influence

    • pickStudentsFromCloud

      public void pickStudentsFromCloud(UUID uuid) throws IllegalActionException, EmptyCloudException, WrongUUIDException
      Takes the students from the cloudTile and adds them to the entrance of the current player's schoolBoard
      Parameters:
      uuid - the cloudTile's uuid
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - if the player is trying to execute an action in the wrong game phase
      EmptyCloudException - if the cloudTile is empty
      WrongUUIDException - if on the table there aren't cloudTiles with the same uuid as the one passed as a parameter

    • checkProfessorsStatus

      void checkProfessorsStatus(PawnColor color)
      Checks if the current player has the highest number of students of the given color in his dining room If so, proceeds to move the professor to the player's professor table
      Parameters:
      color - the PawnColor just moved

    • isAssistantDifferentFromOthers

      private boolean isAssistantDifferentFromOthers(AssistantCard assistant)
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistantCard
      Returns:
      true if the assistant is different from every other assistants already played in this turn

    • isRoundComplete

      protected boolean isRoundComplete()
      Returns:
      true if every player has finished the actionPhase

      Sets that the current player has moved a PawnColor

      Returns:
      the new gamePhase

    • changePlayer

      protected void changePlayer()
      Change the current player

    • pickNextPlayer

      private int pickNextPlayer()
      If it's the planning phase, the new player is the next in the list of players If it's another phase, the next player is determined by the score on the assistantCard played during the planning phase
      Returns:
      the index of the next current player

    • playerHasEndedAction

      protected void playerHasEndedAction()
      Called when a player has finished the action phase If there's still at least one player that has to play the action phase, the game phase is set to ACTION_MOVE_STUDENTS and a new current player is picked If every player has played, the endOfRound method is called

    • endOfRound

      public void endOfRound()
      Ends of the round

    • checkImmediateGameOver

      public void checkImmediateGameOver()
      Checks if any player has build his last tower or if only three islands group are left on the table

    • checkRoundGameOver

      public void checkRoundGameOver()
      Checks if the bag is empty or if any player has run out of assistantCard

    • whoIsWinning

      private List<String> whoIsWinning()
      If a player has fewer towers than the other players, wins If two players have the same number of towers, but one has more professors, wins If two players have the same number of towers and professors, they tied
      Returns:
      the nickname of the winner/winners

      Throws:
      GameNotFoundException - if the game wasn't found

      private void notEnoughOnline()

      private void enoughOnline()
